table.name: vtiger_catalogosalvaguarda
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_catalogosalvaguarda` ( `catalogosalvaguardaid` int(11) NOT NULL, `referencia` varchar(250) default NULL, `tiposalvaguarda` varchar(150) default NULL, `catalogosalvaguarda_no` varchar(250) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`catalogosalvaguardaid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_catalogosalvaguardacf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_catalogosalvaguardacf` ( `catalogosalvaguardaid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`catalogosalvaguardaid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
